description: Deletes a specific version of a bot. To delete all versions of a bot, use the DeleteBot operation.

parameters.name: botId
parameters.description: The identifier of the bot that contains the version.

parameters.name: botVersion
parameters.description: The version of the bot to delete.

nested_items.name: botId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the bot that is being deleted.

nested_items.name: botVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the bot that is being deleted.

nested_items.name: botStatus
nested_items.description: The current status of the bot.
